title: Billie Jean King Says Women's Tennis is Improving
summary: Billie Jean King is a famous tennis player who won 39 big tournaments called Grand Slams. She helped start the Women's Tennis Association (WTA), which organizes women's tennis games. King says that the WTA made a new deal with Mercedes-Benz, a car company, worth a billion dollars. This deal shows that women's tennis is leading the way in women's sports. It means more money and support for female tennis players, helping the sport grow. King believes this is a good sign that women's tennis is moving in the right direction. Her opinion is important because she has worked hard for women's rights in sports. This news can encourage girls to play tennis and shows that women's sports are getting more attention.

background_read: Tennis is a sport where players use rackets to hit a ball over a net. The Women's Tennis Association (WTA) was created to help women play tennis professionally. Sponsors like Mercedes-Benz give money to sports to help them grow. Billie Jean King is a role model who won many tournaments and fights for equality. This deal with Mercedes-Benz is a big step for women's tennis, showing it is getting more support and respect.
